Author: Pink_salts
Text: Yea I used to be able to drink smoothies, but I can’t anymore cuz it’ll just trigger me to b/p.

Author: SimDelCalSalBris
Text: No, it makes complete sense. At my worst place, I couldn’t bear to even drink anything that didn’t have the texture of water. Not even juice with pulp.  It’s because when I eat, my stomach feels full at least for a little bit. When I drink anything, I tend to pee it out very quickly, so it was just a vicious cycle of always feeling empty and hence, ‘at my skinniest’.
